revised_title: Snapshot Echo-Planar Imaging Techniques and Future Developments
tldr: The article discusses recent developments and future prospects of snapshot echo-planar imaging methods, a high-speed imaging technique used in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI). It explores the evolution of the technique, its applications, and the challenges faced in improving image quality and patient comfort. The authors also touch upon the potential of combining EPI with spectroscopy and new volumetric imaging developments.
